Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 25th overall pick, by Bay City in 1984...
Injured on 6/1/1984 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/8/1987, off Stephen Hanchett (TRO)...
Earned first career win on 4/13/1987...
Traded from Bay City to Capital City on 7/31/1989 (Going to CC: P I. Vaughn, P C. Plasencia. Going to BC: P E. Putz)...
Traded from Capital City to Pontiac on 7/15/1990 (Going to CC: P D. Thompson, P L. Mosqueda. Going to PON: P I. Vaughn)...
